project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that fetches current weather information using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather information
Extract and process temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for fetching and processing data
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure correctness
